dc_title_s: Burgundia ducatus; per Gerardum Mercatore cum privilegio.
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. North oriented to the right. Does not directly any states listed in van der Krogt. The spelling of Mercator's name is different on this map. From the Composite Atlas of France, title created to represent a unique collection within the Clark Library, University of Michigan. 1 map; 32 x 44 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Mercator, Gerhard, 1512-1594.,Vignaud, Henry, 1830-1922, former owner, Composite Atlas of France.
